00021 #pragma once
00022 
00023 #include <l4/sys/compiler.h>
00024 #include <iosfwd>
00025 
00026 namespace L4Re { namespace Video {
00027 
00032 class L4_EXPORT Color_component
00033 {
00034 private:
00035   unsigned char _bits;    
00036   unsigned char _shift;   
00037 
00038 public:
00040   Color_component() : _bits(0), _shift(0) {}
00041 
00047   Color_component(unsigned char bits, unsigned char shift)
00048   : _bits(bits), _shift(shift) {}
00049 
00054   unsigned char size() const { return _bits; }
00055 
00060   unsigned char shift() const { return _shift; }
00061 
00066   bool operator == (Color_component const &o) const
00067   { return _shift == o._shift && _bits == o._bits; }
00068 
00074   int get(unsigned long v) const
00075   {
00076     return ((v >> (unsigned long)_shift)
00077       & ~(~0UL << (unsigned long)_bits)) << (unsigned long)(16 - _bits);
00078   }
00079 
00085   long unsigned set(int v) const
00086   { return (v >> (unsigned long)(16 - _bits)) << (unsigned long)_shift; }
00087 
00093   template< typename STREAM >
00094   STREAM &dump(STREAM &s) const
00095   {
00096     s << (int)size() << '(' << (int)shift() << ')';
00097     return s;
00098   }
00099 } __attribute__((packed));
00100 
00108 class L4_EXPORT Pixel_info
00109 {
00110 private:
00111   Color_component _r, _g, _b, _a;  
00112   unsigned char _bpp;              
00113 
00114 public:
00119   Color_component const &r() const { return _r; }
00120 
00125   Color_component const &g() const { return _g; }
00126 
00131   Color_component const &b() const { return _b; }
00132 
00137   Color_component const &a() const { return _a; }
00138 
00143   unsigned char bytes_per_pixel() const { return _bpp; }
00144 
00149   unsigned char bits_per_pixel() const
00150   { return _r.size() + _g.size() + _b.size() +_a.size(); }
00151 
00156   bool has_alpha() const { return _a.size() > 0; }
00157 
00162   void r(Color_component const &c) { _r = c; }
00163 
00168   void g(Color_component const &c) { _g = c; }
00169 
00174   void b(Color_component const &c) { _b = c; }
00175 
00180   void a(Color_component const &c) { _a = c; }
00181 
00186   void bytes_per_pixel(unsigned char bpp) { _bpp = bpp; }
00187 
00191   Pixel_info() : _r(), _g(), _b(), _a() {}
00192 
00205   Pixel_info(unsigned char bpp, char r, char rs, char g, char gs,
00206              char b, char bs, char a = 0, char as = 0)
00207   : _r(r, rs), _g(g, gs), _b(b, bs), _a(a, as), _bpp(bpp)
00208   {}
00209 
00216   template<typename VBI>
00217   explicit Pixel_info(VBI const *vbi)
00218   : _r(vbi->red_mask_size, vbi->red_field_position),
00219     _g(vbi->green_mask_size, vbi->green_field_position),
00220     _b(vbi->blue_mask_size, vbi->blue_field_position),
00221     _bpp((vbi->bits_per_pixel + 7) / 8)
00222   {}
00223 
00229   bool operator == (Pixel_info const &o) const
00230   {
00231     return _r == o._r && _g == o._g && _b == o._b && _a == o._a && _bpp == o._bpp;
00232   }
00233 
00239   template< typename STREAM >
00240   STREAM &dump(STREAM &s) const
00241   {
00242     s << "RGBA(" << (int)bytes_per_pixel() << "): ";
00243     r().dump(s) << ':';
00244     g().dump(s) << ':';
00245     b().dump(s) << ':';
00246     a().dump(s);
00247     return s;
00248   }
00249 };
00250 
00251 
00252 }}
